data.prayer: Lord, please give the 3,634 believers in the state of Mid-Western the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mid-Western, Nepal

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Mid-Western, Nepal.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Mid-Western, Nepal to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3,634 believers in Mid-Western.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Byansi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, it’s possible most of the 2,970,197 lost people in  Mid-Western, Nepal have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Mid-Western to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mid-Western, Nepal has a population of 3,013,000.

We estimate Mid-Western has 3,634 people who might know Jesus, 39,169 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,970,197 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 829 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Mid-Western, Nepal humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Mid-Western
